pageTitle: Action Pinball & Amusement - Fuse Kit Contents
textBeforeTable: Fuse Kit Contents: NOTE: Information on this page is subject to availability and may change without notice- may not be current. Fuse types are subject to current availability. If you have any questions, just e-mail us. Atari Games:    Kit # FKATARI    Order This Kit Action Pinball & Amusement, LLC www.actionpinball.com
textAfterTable: Bally EM Games:    Kit # FKBLYEM    Order This Kit Qty Type Use 2 5A Bridge rectifier, DC coils 2 8A Main line fuse 4 10A Coils 4 15A Lamps Bally Solid-State Games:    Kit # FKBLYSS    Order This Kit NOTE: This kit does not include the short AGX-type fuse for score display high voltage (located on solenoid/regulator board). Original 3/16-amp AGX fuse is obsolete. You can order and use a 1/4-amp AGX fuse in place of the original 3/16-amp AGX fuse.
